title: Springboot-Ecommerce Application
description: This project is a web application designed to facilitate the online purchase of books, leveraging the powerful Spring Boot framework.

title: Cosmetics-Ecommerce Application
description: Developed a web application for purchasing cosmetics online as part of an assignment. Features include product listings, a shopping cart, user authentication, and order management.

title: Docker-Beginner project
description: This is deployment of a basic Python Flask App as images into Docker hub.

title: full-stack MERN notes app
description: Currently developing a full-stack notes application using the MERN stack. This app allows users to create, save, and manage their notes efficiently.
